ComicInfo.Summary: Colonel Ruplinger's Traveling Carnival and Motorsports Exposition Presents All Live! All Evil! Satan Lord of the Underworld...: Carnival worker and crash car derby racer Golly Munhollen is on clean-up duty again as Satan has ripped off his face and made the rubes puke all over Brother Dare's revival tent. Jonesing for a plug of chaw, he worms five bucks out of Vaughn by promising to grab the tush of fat lady turned strong lady, Pig Anderson gets punched in the face for his trouble. Floating into unconsciousness, Golly meets a glowing triangle that claims to be an angel who asks him to become God's agent on earth to battle the forces of evil, Golly accepts.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-14 10:36:05. [CVDB221886] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 11:33:47. [Issue ID 555862]
